title: Awesome List Updates on Jul 01, 2023

items.title: Awesome Docker
items.content_text:
### Security

*   [Sysdig Secure](https://sysdig.com/solutions/cloud-threat-detection-and-response/) :heavy\_dollar\_sign: - Sysdig Secure addresses run-time security through behavioral monitoring and defense, and provides deep forensics based on open source Sysdig for incident response.
items.content_html:
Security

  • Sysdig Secure üí≤ - Sysdig Secure addresses run-time security through behavioral monitoring and defense, and provides deep forensics based on open source Sysdig for incident response.

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Themes / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [agnoster-multiline (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/mxkrsv/agnoster-multiline) - Based on [Agnoster (‚≠ê4.1k)](https://github.com/agnoster/agnoster-zsh-theme). Includes decorators for current directory and `git` status. Requires a font with powerline and `git` glyphs. Automatically disables non-ascii glyphs on linux ttys.
*   [riverside (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/skippyr/riverside) - A more portable descendent of [River Dreams (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/skippyr/river_dreams) inspired by robbyrussell and kafeitu. Includes decorators for `git` status, user\@hostname, current directory and the current python virtual environment.
items.content_html:
Themes / superconsole - Windows-only

  • agnoster-multiline (‚≠ê0) - Based on Agnoster (‚≠ê4.1k). Includes decorators for current directory and git status. Requires a font with powerline and git glyphs. Automatically disables non-ascii glyphs on linux ttys.
  • riverside (‚≠ê0) - A more portable descendent of River Dreams (‚≠ê3) inspired by robbyrussell and kafeitu. Includes decorators for git status, user@hostname, current directory and the current python virtual environment.

items.title: Awesome Langchain
items.content_text:
### Tools / Agents

*   [DemoGPT (‚≠ê1.8k)](https://github.com/melih-unsal/DemoGPT): DemoGPT enables you to create quick demos by just using prompt. It applies ToT approach on Langchain documentation tree. ![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/melih-unsal/DemoGPT?style=social)
items.content_html:
Tools / Agents

  • DemoGPT (‚≠ê1.8k): DemoGPT enables you to create quick demos by just using prompt. It applies ToT approach on Langchain documentation tree.

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Communication - IRC

*   [Ergo](https://ergo.chat/) - Modern IRCv3 server written in Go, combining the features of an ircd, a services framework, and a bouncer. ([Source Code (‚≠ê2.9k)](https://github.com/ergochat/ergo)) `MIT` `Go/Docker`
*   [InspIRCd](https://www.inspircd.org/) - Modular IRC server written in C++ for Linux, BSD, Windows, and macOS. ([Source Code (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/inspircd/inspircd)) `GPL-2.0` `C++/Docker`
*   [The Lounge](https://thelounge.chat/) - Self-hosted web IRC client. ([Demo](https://demo.thelounge.chat/), [Source Code (‚≠ê5.9k)](https://github.com/thelounge/thelounge)) `MIT` `Nodejs/Docker`
items.content_html:
Software / Communication - IRC

  • Ergo - Modern IRCv3 server written in Go, combining the features of an ircd, a services framework, and a bouncer. (Source Code (‚≠ê2.9k)) MIT Go/Docker
  • InspIRCd - Modular IRC server written in C++ for Linux, BSD, Windows, and macOS. (Source Code (‚≠ê1.2k)) GPL-2.0 C++/Docker
  • The Lounge - Self-hosted web IRC client. (Demo, Source Code (‚≠ê5.9k)) MIT Nodejs/Docker
